name: Title Fight
description:
'''Title Fight''' was an American [[rock music|rock]] band from [[Kingston, Pennsylvania]], formed in 2003. They released three studio albums —''[[Shed (album)|Shed]]'' (2011), ''[[Floral Green]]'' (2012), and ''[[Hyperview (album)|Hyperview]]'' (2015) — gradually shifting from a [[hardcore punk]]–oriented sound toward [[shoegaze]] and [[indie rock]]. ''Hyperview'' was released through [[Anti- (record label)|Anti-]], a record label which the band signed to in July 2014.

The band has been on a hiatus since 2018.
